get.summary: Get application details
Get torrent info and streaming URLs

parameters.description: Link to torrent file / magnet link (base64 encoded)
parameters.name: base64uri

get.summary: Cast media file to TV or media player

parameters.description: Base64 encoded location of the device to cast to
parameters.name: base64location

parameters.description: Base64 encoded URI encoded query string. Supported parameters: video, subtitle, title
parameters.name: base64query

get.summary: Delete torrent from torrent client

parameters.description: Infohash of torrent to delete
parameters.name: hash

get.summary: Delete all torrents from torrent client
Get movie torrents by IMDB id

parameters.description: IMDB id of the movie
parameters.name: imdb

parameters.description: Torrent providers to use, separated by comma. Possible values: jackett, yts, 1337x, itorrent
parameters.name: providers

get.summary: Get movie torrents by IMDB id and query string

parameters.description: IMDB id of the movie
parameters.name: imdb

parameters.description: URI encoded query string. Supported parameters: title, releaseyear
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Torrent providers to use, separated by comma. Possible values: jackett, yts, 1337x, itorrent
parameters.name: providers

get.summary: Get movie torrents by query string

parameters.description: URI encoded query string. Supported parameters: title, releaseyear
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Torrent providers to use, separated by comma. Possible values: jackett, yts, 1337x, itorrent
parameters.name: providers

get.summary: Get show torrents by IMDB id and query string

parameters.description: IMDB id of the show
parameters.name: imdb

parameters.description: URI encoded query string. Supported parameters: title
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Season number. Use 0 to search for all seasons
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Episode number. Use 0 to search for all episodes
parameters.name: episode

parameters.description: Torrent providers to use, separated by comma. Possible values: jackett, eztv, 1337x, itorrent
parameters.name: providers

parameters.description: Torrent providers to use, separated by comma. Possible values: jackett, eztv, 1337x, itorrent
parameters.name: providers

parameters.description: URI encoded query string. Supported parameters: title
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Season number. Use 0 to search for all seasons
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Episode number. Use 0 to search for all episodes
parameters.name: episode

parameters.description: Torrent providers to use, separated by comma. Possible values: jackett, eztv, 1337x, itorrent
parameters.name: providers

get.summary: Get list of available casting targets
Restart torrent client with new bandwith limits

parameters.description: Maximum download speed in Kbps. Use 0 for unlimited
parameters.name: downrate

parameters.description: Maximum upload speed in Kbps. Use 0 to disable uploading
parameters.name: uprate

get.summary: Launch media player application

parameters.description: Base64 encoded path to the media player executable
parameters.name: base64path

parameters.description: Base64 encoded launch arguments to pass to the media player
parameters.name: base64args

get.summary: Get torrent download stats

parameters.description: Infohash of the torrent
parameters.name: hash

get.summary: Shut down the application
Get subtitles by torrent's inner file hash

parameters.description: Infohash of the torrent
parameters.name: hash

parameters.description: Base64 encoded path with filename (for example: Season.1/Stranger.Things.S01E01.1080p.mkv, encoded to base64)
parameters.name: base64path

parameters.description: ISO 639-2 three-letter language codes, separated by comma
parameters.name: lang

get.summary: Get subtitles by IMDB id

parameters.description: IMDB id of the movie or show
parameters.name: imdb

parameters.description: ISO 639-2 three-letter language codes, separated by comma
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Season number. Must be set to 0 for movie subtitle search.
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Episode number. Must be set to 0 for movie subtitle search.
parameters.name: episode

get.summary: Get subtitles by text

parameters.description: Title of the movie or show
parameters.name: text

parameters.description: ISO 639-2 three-letter language codes, separated by comma
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Season number. Must be set to 0 for movie subtitle search.
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Episode number. Must be set to 0 for movie subtitle search.
parameters.name: episode

get.summary: Discover movies by genre

parameters.description: Genre ids separated by comma, or 'all' to search for all genres. Possible values: 28 (Action), 12	(Adventure), 16	(Animation), 35	(Comedy), 80 (Crime), 99 (Documentary), 18 (Drama), 10751 (Family), 14 (Fantasy), 36 (History), 27 (Horror), 10402 (Music), 9648 (Mystery), 10749 (Romance), 878 (Sci-fi), 53 (Thriller), 10752 (War), 37 (Western)
parameters.name: genretype

parameters.description: Sort order. Possible values: popularity.asc, popularity.desc, release_date.asc, release_date.desc, revenue.asc, revenue.desc, primary_release_date.asc, primary_release_date.desc, original_title.asc, original_title.desc, vote_average.asc, vote_average.desc, vote_count.asc, vote_count.desc
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or tv shows that have a release or air date that is less than or equal to the specified value. Standard date format: YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: ISO 639-1 two-letter language code
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Specify the page of results to query
parameters.name: page

get.summary: Discover shows by genre

parameters.description: Genre ids separated by comma, or 'all' to search for all genres. Possible values: 10759 (Action & Adventure), 16 (Animation), 35 (Comedy), 80 (Crime), 99 (Documentary), 18 (Drama), 10751 (Family), 10762 (Kids), 9648 (Mystery), 10763 (News), 10764 (Reality), 10765 (Sci-fi & Fantasy), 10766 (Soap), 10767 (Talk), 10768 (War & Politics), 37 (Western)
parameters.name: genretype

parameters.description: Sort order. Possible values: popularity.asc, popularity.desc, release_date.asc, release_date.desc, revenue.asc, revenue.desc, primary_release_date.asc, primary_release_date.desc, original_title.asc, original_title.desc, vote_average.asc, vote_average.desc, vote_count.asc, vote_count.desc
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or tv shows that have a release or air date that is less than or equal to the specified value. Standard date format: YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: ISO 639-1 two-letter language code
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Specify the page of results to query
parameters.name: page
